participant_1.background:
I have a history of mental illness, but my friends have always been there for me.
i have not had to work a day in my life.
i like to read books about chinese history.
i can t go a single day without eating ice cream.
i smoke two packs of cigarettes most days.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.
I enjoy playing Magic: the Gathering in my free time.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.
My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day.
i live with my parents and my little brother.

content.text: Nothing much, just listening to some Red Hot Chili Peppers. How about you?
I'm just chilling, trying to figure out what to do today.
Well, if you're bored, you could always come over and play Magic: the Gathering with me and my friends.
That sounds fun! I love playing Magic, but I don't have a deck.
Oh, that's okay. We have some extra decks you can use.
Awesome! I'll be there in 10 minutes.
Thanks! So, what are we playing?
We're playing Commander. It's a multiplayer format where you each build a deck with a legendary creature as your commander.
Oh, that sounds cool! I've never played Commander before.
No problem! We can teach you how to play.
That was so much fun! I can't believe I've never played Commander before.
I'm glad you enjoyed it! We should play again sometime.
Definitely! I'll bring my own deck next time.
